title: Warning: Dynamic output file name has to be defined using a closure
body:
Current version of nextflow gives warnings

``` bash
$ ./nextflow run assemble.nf
N E X T F L O W  ~  version 0.12.3
WARN: Dynamic output file name has to be defined using a closure -- Replace `file "$s.ssake.fa.gz"` with `file { "$s.ssake.fa.gz" }`
[warm up] executor > local
WARN: Dynamic output file name has to be defined using a closure -- Replace `file "$s.ssake.reformatted.fa.gz"` with `file { "$s.ssake.reformatted.fa.gz" }`
WARN: Dynamic output file name has to be defined using a closure -- Replace `file "$s.ssake.d/$s.contigs"` with `file { "$s.ssake.d/$s.contigs" }`
WARN: Dynamic output file name has to be defined using a closure -- Replace `file "$s.contigs.bwa.sorted.bam"` with `file { "$s.contigs.bwa.sorted.bam" }`
WARN: Dynamic output file name has to be defined using a closure -- Replace `file "$s.contigs.bwa.sorted.vcf.gz"` with `file { "$s.contigs.bwa.sorted.vcf.gz" }`
WARN: Dynamic output file name has to be defined using a closure -- Replace `file "$s.paired.fq.gz"` with `file { "$s.paired.fq.gz" }`
WARN: Dynamic output file name has to be defined using a closure -- Replace `file "$s.reads.bwa.sorted.bam"` with `file { "$s.reads.bwa.sorted.bam" }`
WARN: Dynamic output file name has to be defined using a closure -- Replace `file "$s.reads.bwa.sorted.vcf.gz"` with `file { "$s.reads.bwa.sorted.vcf.gz" }`
```

title: SSAKE hangs when .command.out reaches 64k in size
